/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the image. The buildings that flank the street are predominantly white and gray, their neutral tones contrasting with the vibrant blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and enhancing the colors of the buildings and vehicles.
